title: League Stuck at 33% HELP!
body: So, I recently got a new computer and I've been trying to install league on it. I installed the launcher but when it's download the patches (I think that's what it's doing idk...) it gets stuck at 33%! I've been trying so hard to fix it, I did a lot of research but none of the fixes work. I really need some help because I want to play league on my new computer. Thanks in advanced.

replies.body:
An unstable connection to the patching service is generally the culprit for getting stuck at 33% during the patching process. To address this, I strongly recommend working through the steps outlined in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). 

Let me know if you continue to have issues after taking those steps.
Ah it's fixed now XD. Thanks!!
